de.mrapp.android.dialog.model

Interface ValidateableDialog

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dialog, HeaderDialog, HeaderDialogDecorator, MaterialDialog, MaterialDialogDecorator, ValidateableDialogDecorator
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ButtonBarDialog, ListDialog, ScrollableDialog
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractButtonBarDialog, AbstractListDialog, AbstractScrollableDialog, AbstractValidateableDialog, MaterialDialog, ProgressDialog

    public interface ValidateableDialog
extends HeaderDialog, ValidateableDialogDecorator
    Defines the interface, a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and can be validated, must implement.
    Since:
    3.2.0
